sentences.sContent: Lymphocyte is a kind of leucocyte of small volume.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lymphocyte is a kind of leucocyte of small volume.
sentences.sCn: 淋巴细胞是一种体积较小的白细胞。

sentences.sContent: People calls leukaemia " hematic cancer " have stated reason, leukaemia is the leucocyte in blood malign hyperplasia, treat hard like general cancer.
sentences.sContent_eng: People calls leukaemia " hematic cancer " have stated reason, leukaemia is the leucocyte in blood malign hyperplasia, treat hard like general cancer.
sentences.sCn: 人们把白血病称为“ 血癌”是有一定道理的，白血病就是血液中的白细胞恶性增殖，像一般癌症一样难以治疗。

sentences.sContent: Periodical examination of hepatic or renal function and blood picture is desirable since Kedacillin may increase SGOT. SGPT and BUN, and decrease erythrocyte and leucocyte.
sentences.sContent_eng: Periodical examination of hepatic or renal function and blood picture is desirable since Kedacillin may increase SGOT. SGPT and BUN, and decrease erythrocyte and leucocyte.
sentences.sCn: 磺苄青霉素钠可使血清谷-草转氨酶，血清谷-丙转氨酶和血液尿素氮增高，使红细胞和白细胞减少．所以最好要定期检查肝、肾功能和血象。

words.tran: [内科] 白细胞增多，白血球增多

trans.tranOther: any of the various large unpigmented cells in the blood of vertebrates
